body_html: @harshini-gadige I have tried normalizing the data to (0,1) but the data is not equally distributed so I have normalized it with mean and standard deviation even though now i'm getting r2 = 0.42 at max. I have also tried till 1e-5 learning rates.

body: @harshini-gadige I have tried normalizing the data to (0,1) but the data is not equally distributed so I have normalized it with mean and standard deviation even though now i'm getting r2 = 0.42 at max. I have also tried till 1e-5 learning rates.
